snippet: The end of the inquiry into allegations that former President Nicolas Sarkozy had manipulated an heiress into financing his campaign removed a potential obstacle to a political return.
abstract: French magistrates say they are dropping an investigation into charges that former Pres Nicolas Sarkozy had manipulated a fragile heiress Liliane Bettencourt into financing his 2007 campaign, removing a potential obstacle to the political return that Sarkozy is widely assumed to be planning.
lead_paragraph: The end of the inquiry into allegations that former President Nicolas Sarkozy had manipulated an heiress into financing his campaign removed a potential obstacle to a political return.

headline.main: French Judges Drop Investigation Into Charges Against Sarkozy
headline.print_headline: French Judges Drop Investigation Into Charges Against Sarkozy
